name: Dodge Pirsh!
description:
- It's really simple! Just dodge bullets!

■ Controls - Arrow Keys or WASD to move (when gameover, press r to restart)

■ Compete with your friends, Best Time! -  Game will record best time, so you can compete with your friends!

■ Easy to Play, Hard to Master! - This game is reaaaaally simple, but scoring high is not that easy. Survive from stage that getting harder!
